PHLOX: How Projection Walls Work
2
1
PHLOX: Projection walls allow Nomai to talk to each other without being in the same place. It's a wonderful technology for talking to friends from far away!
3
2
PHLOX: To use a projection wall, a projection stone needs to be put in the pedestal. This connects the projection wall to the corresponding projection wall, sharing anything written on both walls!
4
3
PHLOX: Incoming messages from the other projection wall are written in an orange color! This makes it easier to tell which side is talking.
5
4
FILIX: Well done, Phlox! But did you know the projection walls are a newer version of the way our Vessel communications used to work?
6
5
PHLOX: Really? I didn't know that!
7
6
FILIX: It's true! Though they are unable to connect to the Vessels' communication network, the projection walls were an iteration of their design, which separated incoming and outgoing messages into different walls.
8
3
PHLOX: New projection stones are crafted at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> every day, allowing us to talk and project from more and more places!
